triples.name: Survey methodology
triples.relevance: The paper empirically tests participatory technology impacts using two original survey experiments.

triples.name: Qualitative research
triples.relevance: The paper collects and analyzes qualitative data from interviews and focus groups.

triples.name: Focus group
triples.relevance: Focus groups are used as a primary qualitative data collection method in the study.

triples.name: Participatory democracy
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a framework analyzing how participatory technologies influence political attitudes and citizen voice.

triples.name: Political culture
triples.relevance: The study examines attitudes toward authorities and political perceptions shaped by participatory mechanisms.
